climate.name: Mean Temperature of Warmest Quarter
climate.desc: Mean Temperature of Warmest Quarter  for 1950-2000.

climate.name: Mean Temperature of Coldest Quarter
climate.desc: Mean Temperature of Coldest Quarter  for 1950-2000.

climate.name: Temperature Mean Diurnal Range
climate.desc: Mean Diurnal Range (Mean of monthly (max temp - min temp)) for 1950-2000.

climate.name: Max Temperature of Warmest Month
climate.desc: Max Temperature of Warmest Month  for 1950-2000.

climate.name: Min Temperature of Coldest Month
climate.desc: Min Temperature of Coldest Month  for 1950-2000.

climate.name: Mean Temperature of Wettest Quarter
climate.desc: Mean Temperature of Wettest Quarter  for 1950-2000.

climate.name: Mean Temperature of Driest Quarter
climate.desc: Mean Temperature of Driest Quarter  for 1950-2000.

human.name: Travel time to Market
human.desc: Travel time (hours, by road and/or water) to the nearest city with population larger than 50,000 in the year 2000.

soils.name: Depth to Bedrock
soils.desc: Depth to bedrock (R horizon) up to maximum 240 cm.

soils.name: Bulk Density 2.5cm
soils.desc: Bulk density in kg / cubic-meter (mean estimate) for 2.5 cm depth.

soils.name: Cation Exchange Capacity 2.5cm
soils.desc: Cation exchange capacity in cmolc/kg (mean estimate) for 2.5 cm depth.

soils.name: Clay Percentage 2.5cm
soils.desc: Soil texture fraction clay in percent (mean estimate) for 2.5 cm depth.

soils.name: Coarse Fragments 2.5cm
soils.desc: Coarse fragments volumetric in percent (mean estimate) for 2.5 cm depth.

soils.name: Organic Carbon Stock 2.5cm
soils.desc: Soil organic carbon stock in tonnes per ha (mean estimate) for 2.5 cm depth.

soils.name: Organic Carbon Content 2.5cm
soils.desc: Soil organic carbon content (fine earth fraction) in permilles (mean estimate) for 2.5 cm depth.

soils.name: Organic Carbon Content 10cm
soils.desc: Soil organic carbon content (fine earth fraction) in permilles (mean estimate) for 10 cm depth.

soils.name: pH 2.5cm
soils.desc: Soil pH x 10 in H2O (mean estimate) for 2.5 cm depth.

soils.name: pH 10cm
soils.desc: Soil pH x 10 in H2O (mean estimate) for 10 cm depth.

soils.name: Silt Percentage 2.5cm
soils.desc: Soil texture fraction silt in percent (mean estimate) for 2.5 cm depth.

soils.name: Sand Percentage 2.5cm
soils.desc: Soil texture fraction sand in percent (mean estimate) for 2.5 cm depth.

topo.name: Roughness
topo.desc: Difference between the maximum and the minimum value of a cell and its 8 surrounding cells.

topo.name: Topographic Position Index
topo.desc: Difference between the value of a cell and the mean value of its 8 surrounding cells.

topo.name: Terrain Ruggedness Index
topo.desc: Mean of the absolute differences between the value of a cell and the value of its 8 surrounding cells.
